page.title: 20RESERVOIR KEEPER COLD ASHTON
page.content: The reservoir keeper is a typical local{resident}of Cold Ashton. He enjoys its rural character and hopes to preserve it.He has lived and worked in the area for{32 years}and brought his family up there. His{job}has changed somewhat over he years. Originally he was totally responsible for the reservoir, which he found very satisfying. Now he only has to do the daily safety checks but he has to monitor polution over a large area of Wessex. He was{Chairman of the Parish {Council}for a time during which a {help scheme}for people needing to visit doctors, hospitals etc was organised, as public transport is difficult.He worries that the{property is being improved and enlarged so much that it is beyond the buying capacity of local{young people.
